short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Convert experiment URL parameters to every page of your website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert Experiment URL Modifier: Streamline A/B Testing Across Your Website

Effortlessly add Convert.com experiment parameters to all pages. Boost your A/B testing workflow with customizable URL modifications for seamless multi-page experiments. Perfect for marketers, developers, and optimization specialists.

Key Features:
- Automatically appends Convert.com experience and variant IDs to URLs
- Whitelist specific domains for targeted testing
- Toggle functionality on/off with ease
- Simplify multi-page experiment QA

Optimize your conversion rate testing process with this essential tool for Convert.com users.
